table.name: vtiger_countries
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_countries` ( `countriesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `countriesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`countriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_countriescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_countriescf` ( `countriesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`countriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_countries_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_countries_user_field` ( `recordid` Int( 25 ) NOT NULL, `userid` Int( 25 ) NOT NULL, `starred` VarChar( 100 ) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL ) CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ENGINE = InnoDB
